chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
P: BaseParams
params: MultiParams P
q: packet
p: packet

Goal:
{p = q} + {p <> q}

Premises:
Record MultiParams (P : BaseParams) : Type := Build_MultiParams { name : Type; msg : Type; msg_eq_dec : forall x y : msg, {x = y} + {x <> y}; name_eq_dec : forall x y : name, {x = y} + {x <> y}; nodes : list name; all_names_nodes : forall n : name, In n nodes; no_dup_nodes : NoDup nodes; init_handlers : name -> data; net_handlers : name -> name -> msg -> data -> list output * data * list (name * msg); input_handlers : name -> input -> data -> list output * data * list (name * msg) } Arguments Build_MultiParams _ [name msg]%type_scope (_ _)%function_scope [nodes]%list_scope _%function_scope _ (_ _ _)%function_scope
file_name_eq_dec : forall x y : file_name, {x = y} + {x <> y} where ?P : [P : BaseParams params : MultiParams P p : packet q : packet |- BaseParams] ?DiskOpMultiParams : [P : BaseParams params : MultiParams P p : packet q : packet |- DiskOpMultiParams ?P]
do_name_eq_dec : forall x y : do_name, {x = y} + {x <> y} where ?P : [P : BaseParams params : MultiParams P p : packet q : packet |- BaseParams] ?DiskOpMultiParams : [P : BaseParams params : MultiParams P p : packet q : packet |- DiskOpMultiParams ?P]
do_msg_eq_dec : forall x y : do_msg, {x = y} + {x <> y} where ?P : [P : BaseParams params : MultiParams P p : packet q : packet |- BaseParams] ?DiskOpMultiParams : [P : BaseParams params : MultiParams P p : packet q : packet |- DiskOpMultiParams ?P]
Fin.eq_dec : forall x y : Fin.t ?n, {x = y} + {x <> y} where ?n : [P : BaseParams params : MultiParams P p : packet q : packet |- nat]
Assoc.a_equiv : (forall k k' : ?K, {k = k'} + {k <> k'}) -> list (?K * ?V) -> list (?K * ?V) -> Prop where ?K : [P : BaseParams params : MultiParams P p : packet q : packet |- Type] ?V : [P : BaseParams params : MultiParams P p : packet q : packet |- Type]
update : (forall x y : ?A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) -> (?A -> ?B) -> ?A -> ?B -> ?A -> ?B where ?A : [P : BaseParams params : MultiParams P p : packet q : packet |- Type] ?B : [P : BaseParams params : MultiParams P p : packet q : packet |- Type]
update2 : (forall x y : ?A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) -> (?A -> ?A -> ?B) -> ?A -> ?A -> ?B -> ?A -> ?A -> ?B where ?A : [P : BaseParams params : MultiParams P p : packet q : packet |- Type] ?B : [P : BaseParams params : MultiParams P p : packet q : packet |- Type]
collate : (forall x y : ?A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) -> ?A -> (?A -> ?A -> list ?B) -> list (?A * ?B) -> ?A -> ?A -> list ?B where ?A : [P : BaseParams params : MultiParams P p : packet q : packet |- Type] ?B : [P : BaseParams params : MultiParams P p : packet q : packet |- Type]
collate_ls : (forall x y : ?A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) -> list ?A -> (?A -> ?A -> list ?B) -> ?A -> ?B -> ?A -> ?A -> list ?B where ?A : [P : BaseParams params : MultiParams P p : packet q : packet |- Type] ?B : [P : BaseParams params : MultiParams P p : packet q : packet |- Type]
adjacent_to_dec : forall x y : name, {adjacent_to x y} + {~ adjacent_to x y} where ?P0 : [P : BaseParams params : MultiParams P p : packet q : packet |- BaseParams] ?P : [P : BaseParams params : MultiParams P p : packet q : packet |- MultiParams ?P0] ?NameOverlayParams : [P : BaseParams params : MultiParams P p : packet q : packet |- NameOverlayParams ?P]
SST_deliver : forall (i : input) (s s' : data) (out : list output) (tr : list (input + output)), input_handler i s = (out, s') -> tr = inl i :: map inr out -> step_s s s' tr where ?P : [P : BaseParams params : MultiParams P p : packet q : packet |- BaseParams] ?params : [P : BaseParams params : MultiParams P p : packet q : packet |- SingleParams ?P]
S1T_deliver : forall (i : input) (s s' : data) (out : output), handler i s = (out, s') -> step_1 s s' [(i, out)] where ?P : [P : BaseParams params : MultiParams P p : packet q : packet |- BaseParams] ?params : [P : BaseParams params : MultiParams P p : packet q : packet |- OneNodeParams ?P]
do_all_names_nodes : forall n : do_name, In n do_nodes where ?P : [P : BaseParams params : MultiParams P p : packet q : packet |- BaseParams] ?DiskOpMultiParams : [P : BaseParams params : MultiParams P p : packet q : packet |- DiskOpMultiParams ?P]
step_s_sind : forall P0 : data -> data -> list (input + output) -> SProp, (forall (i : input) (s s' : data) (out : list output) (tr : list (input + output)), input_handler i s = (out, s') -> tr = inl i :: map inr out -> P0 s s' tr) -> forall (d d0 : data) (l : list (input + output)), step_s d d0 l -> P0 d d0 l where ?P : [P : BaseParams params : MultiParams P p : packet q : packet |- BaseParams] ?params : [P : BaseParams params : MultiParams P p : packet q : packet |- SingleParams ?P]
step_s_ind : forall P0 : data -> data -> list (input + output) -> Prop, (forall (i : input) (s s' : data) (out : list output) (tr : list (input + output)), input_handler i s = (out, s') -> tr = inl i :: map inr out -> P0 s s' tr) -> forall (d d0 : data) (l : list (input + output)), step_s d d0 l -> P0 d d0 l where ?P : [P : BaseParams params : MultiParams P p : packet q : packet |- BaseParams] ?params : [P : BaseParams params : MultiParams P p : packet q : packet |- SingleParams ?P]
output = fun BaseParams0 : BaseParams => let (_, _, output) := BaseParams0 in output : BaseParams -> Type Arguments output {BaseParams}
input = fun BaseParams0 : BaseParams => let (_, input, _) := BaseParams0 in input : BaseParams -> Type Arguments input {BaseParams}
data = fun BaseParams0 : BaseParams => let (data, _, _) := BaseParams0 in data : BaseParams -> Type Arguments data {BaseParams}
step_1_ind : forall P0 : data -> data -> list (input * output) -> Prop, (forall (i : input) (s s' : data) (out : output), handler i s = (out, s') -> P0 s s' [(i, out)]) -> forall (d d0 : data) (l : list (input * output)), step_1 d d0 l -> P0 d d0 l where ?P : [P : BaseParams params : MultiParams P p : packet q : packet |- BaseParams] ?params : [P : BaseParams params : MultiParams P p : packet q : packet |- OneNodeParams ?P]
step_1_sind : forall P0 : data -> data -> list (input * output) -> SProp, (forall (i : input) (s s' : data) (out : output), handler i s = (out, s') -> P0 s s' [(i, out)]) -> forall (d d0 : data) (l : list (input * output)), step_1 d d0 l -> P0 d d0 l where ?P : [P : BaseParams params : MultiParams P p : packet q : packet |- BaseParams] ?params : [P : BaseParams params : MultiParams P p : packet q : packet |- OneNodeParams ?P]
PropUtil.prod_eq_dec : forall A B : Type, (forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) -> (forall x y : B, {x = y} + {x <> y}) -> forall x y : A * B, {x = y} + {x <> y}
list_eq_dec : forall A : Type, (forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) -> forall l l' : list A, {l = l'} + {l <> l'}
Build_MultiParams : forall (P : BaseParams) (name msg : Type), (forall x y : msg, {x = y} + {x <> y}) -> (forall x y : name, {x = y} + {x <> y}) -> forall nodes : list name, (forall n : name, In n nodes) -> NoDup nodes -> (name -> data) -> (name -> name -> msg -> data -> list output * data * list (name * msg)) -> (name -> input -> data -> list output * data * list (name * msg)) -> MultiParams P
ZArith_dec.Z_notzerop : forall x : BinNums.Z, {x <> BinNums.Z0} + {x = BinNums.Z0}
ZArith_dec.Z_zerop : forall x : BinNums.Z, {x = BinNums.Z0} + {x <> BinNums.Z0}
name_eq_dec : forall x y : name, {x = y} + {x <> y}
BinPos.Pos.eq_dec : forall x y : BinNums.positive, {x = y} + {x <> y}
OrderedTypeEx.Positive_as_OT.eq_dec : forall x y : BinNums.positive, {x = y} + {x <> y}
OrderedTypeEx.String_as_OT.eq_dec : forall x y : String.string, {x = y} + {x <> y}
ZArith_dec.Z_noteq_dec : forall x y : BinNums.Z, {x <> y} + {x = y}
